name: Trash
descriptions: Trash is a deceased woman found in the nuclear test shack in 2281.

Trash decided to move into the abandoned shack at the old nuclear test site in order to become a ghoul because she was tired of her life. However, her optimism got the best of her, and instead of ghoulification, she succumbed to fatal radiation poisoning. Her accounts can be found in the three separate "Die-aries" located in the shack: entry one, entry two, and entry three.
She is a reference to the character of the same name in the film Return of the Living Dead.
